name: TriCube
description:
My first game: TriCube!

This was a fun little project I did. The objective is to get as far as possible with your three cubes, but if they all fall the game ends.

I plan to put this on the App Store, and also intend on giving plenty of improvements and updates.

The main game has three levels of varying difficulty, as well as a hidden bonus level.

The Story?

The year is 2057. Cubes have taken over the world. Now these cubes enjoy entertainment through running and jumping at high speed. Thus, our journey begins.

Hope you enjoy, I'm not the best dev and this is all a learning process for me.

UPDATE: Now on the play store for free!

Game built with a lot of help from the Infinte Runner Engine on Unity Asset Store.
